name: IMPRESSION PRODUCTS, INC., petitioner, v. LEXMARK INTERNATIONAL, INC.
name_abbreviation: Impression Prods., Inc. v. Lexmark Int'l, Inc.

court.name: Supreme Court of the United States

parties:
IMPRESSION PRODUCTS, INC., petitioner,
v.
LEXMARK INTERNATIONAL, INC.
attorneys: Motion of the Acting Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument is granted in part and the time is to be divided as follows: 25 minutes for petitioner, 10 minutes for the Acting Solicitor General, and 30 minutes for respondent.
casebody.head_matter:
IMPRESSION PRODUCTS, INC., petitioner,
v.
LEXMARK INTERNATIONAL, INC.
No. 15-1189.
Supreme Court of the United States
March 6, 2017.
Motion of the Acting Solicitor General for leave to participate in oral argument as amicus curiae and for divided argument is granted in part and the time is to be divided as follows: 25 minutes for petitioner, 10 minutes for the Acting Solicitor General, and 30 minutes for respondent.
